thread.title: Caldwell says he's done talking about controversial play
thread.title_full: Caldwell says he's done talking about controversial play

title: Caldwell says he's done talking about controversial play
text:
> Sports Caldwell says he's done talking about controversial play Detroit Lions head coach Jim Caldwell reacts from the sideline as officials ruled a touchback on a fumble by Lions wide receiver Calvin Johnson that went out of bounds in the end zone late in the fourth quarter of an NFL football game against the Seattle Seahawks, Monday, Oct. 5, 2015, in Seattle. The Seahawks beat the Lions 13-10. (AP Photo/Scott Eklund)
